about.p1: Hashme is an open source bitcoin payment app. Development started in Vancouver in September 2012 as a way to provide local merchants with a convenient way to accept bitcoin payments.
about.p2: You can download the source code to run an instance and connect it to your own bitcoin and lightning nodes. We'll help you get started being a benevolent custodian and payments provider for your community.
about.p3: Account transfers amongst users on our server are done off-chain so they're completely free, instant, and unlimited.

adam.name: Adam Soltys
adam.bio: Adam is a veteran web developer with over 25 years of experience building and maintaining applications and software systems. He holds a Bacherlor of Computer Science degree from the University of British Columbia and has experience in the fields of environmental consulting, aerospace engineering, mesh networking, organic farming, Bitcoin and NFT's.

west.name: West Ma
west.bio:
Having obtained a Bachelor's Degree in Physics and a Master's Degree in Cryogenic Engineering, West Ma has amassed more than 35 years of expertise in the fields of Science, Technology, and International Trade Services. Since 2017, he has served as CEO and COO of a publicly listed company in the crypto mining industry, and has acted as a crypto advisor for energy providers and blockchain infrastructure investment companies.

Currently, West is exploring new areas of interest, including the Bitcoin Lightning Wallet, the Nostr P2P Messaging App, Bitcoin payments for pizza, the carbon footprint of Bitcoin, and the hidden value of Bitcoin mined using carbon-free energy.

locations.description: Here are some businesses that are accepting bitcoin with Hashme. We hope that yours will be next!

error.message: Please try again or contact support.

cost.question: What does it cost?
cost.answer: It's free to register an account and receive payments. We charge a 0.1% conversion fee if you withdraw regular bitcoin to lightning or vice versa.

compatibility.question: Do I need any special device or software?
compatibility.answer: No. Hashme is web based, so as long as you have an internet connection and a web browser, it works anywhere. Retail merchants might use it on a phone or a tablet.

safety.question: When do my funds settle?
safety.answer: Lightning payments are settled instantly. You can withdraw your balance to another wallet or exchange immediately once funds are received.

step1.description: A username and password is all you need to get started.

step2.description: The same as you normally would, but with bitcoin.

step3.description: Spend your coin immediately or save it and watch it grow, the choice is yours.

jobs.pitch1: Hashme is actively looking for developers to join our growing team (full-time or part-time, remote working OK).
jobs.pitch2: Excited about working on open source bitcoin? Then take a look at our repositories on
jobs.pitch3: If you think you can make an impact, we'd love to hear from you. Send us your resume to

landing.header_after_icon: way to get started with bitcoin.
landing.subheader: A simple but powerful web wallet for everyone. No software or hardware required.

info1.title: Instant payments via Lightning
info1.description: We make it easy for merchants to receive retail payments. No waiting for bank settlements or worrying about chargebacks. Instant settlement, in seconds. Say goodbye to 3% credit card processing fees.

info2.title: Simple to use
info2.description1: Just enter an amount in your local currency, share the QR code and youâ€™re done.
info2.description2: We do all the heavy lifting so you can focus on your business.
info2.description3: You always have the option of taking custody of your funds by withdrawing instantly at any time.

info3.title: Brand it your way!
info3.description: Customize your profile page look and feel, or keep it on default - it's totally up to you.

login.passwordRecommendation: We recommend a long, random password generated with a password manager.

newSiteHeader: Join us at our launch party in Vancouver on October 26! Looking for the old hashme? Visit classic.hashme.io

user.likeAnEmail: is like an email for bitcoin. You can publish it on your website or business cards and use it multiple times.

dashboard.conversionFeeWarning: You will be charged a 1% withdrawal fee on the amount.

receive.lessThan1BTCWarning: Please enter an amount less than 1 bitcoin.

settings.aboutPlaceholder: A little something about you or your business address and hours
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Get notified via email when a change occurs on your account or when people send you payments.
settings.smsNotificationsDescription: Hashme will send you text notifications when this is enabled.
settings.tipPromptDescription: Ask people if they want to add a tip before paying their invoices
settings.themeDescription: Select from the default color themes.
settings.securityPINDescription: Set a security pin that will be used to unlock your settings and to send outgoing payments.
settings.autoLockDescription: Your account will go into a secure mode, requiring you to re-enter your credentials after a specified time:
settings.twofaDescription: Add an extra level of security to your device by enabling 2-factor authentication.
